statements: DELETE FROM InfluencerMarketingROI WHERE influencer_id = 123 AND total_cost > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM InfluencerMarketingROI WHERE engagement_count < 500 AND cost_per_engagement < 5.00;
DELETE FROM Engagements WHERE engagement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM Engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'like' AND engagement_cost > 10.50;
DELETE FROM Engagements WHERE engagement_cost > 500.00 AND engagement_type = 'post';
DELETE FROM engagement WHERE influencer_id = 'ab323735-44f5-4c2a-a7a4-9d3c1225201f' AND post_date = '2023-05-15';
